issue.title: [Website] Direct Flight SQL subproject page to main docs after 8.0.0 release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15937](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15937). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-15721 added a subproject page for Flight SQL pointing at <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/> (because the page does not yet exist in the regular docs). After 8.0.0 we should link to the stable docs instead.
